data.name: POP BATTLE
data.detailed_description:
QQ Group：https://jq.qq.com/?_wv=1027&k=ZFAmt3Pm
579859258

Classic gameplay, new upgrade
More interesting heroes, more types of weapons, and various combinations and gameplay.

1. Operation mode: classic charging mode and relaxed parabolic mode, you can choose
2. A variety of skills, a variety of skills, and the character characteristics of different heroes
3. Teamwork Collaborate between heroes and use their characteristics to win
4. Featured maps Various themed maps and unique map events will help you reverse the situation
5. Ranking on the ladder: Win points will increase to the rank, and the whole server will be ranked to see who can come out on top
data.about_the_game:
QQ Group：https://jq.qq.com/?_wv=1027&k=ZFAmt3Pm
579859258

Classic gameplay, new upgrade
More interesting heroes, more types of weapons, and various combinations and gameplay.

1. Operation mode: classic charging mode and relaxed parabolic mode, you can choose
2. A variety of skills, a variety of skills, and the character characteristics of different heroes
3. Teamwork Collaborate between heroes and use their characteristics to win
4. Featured maps Various themed maps and unique map events will help you reverse the situation
5. Ranking on the ladder: Win points will increase to the rank, and the whole server will be ranked to see who can come out on top
data.short_description: Once a classic battle game, reborn and upgraded. The traditional charging mode and the simple parabolic mode coexist, and the classic heroes and new heroes have their own characteristics. Retain the original flavor, richer hero skills, and more types of team combinations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64-bit system
  • Processor: Intel G640
  • Graphics: 8500 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64-bit system
  • Processor: Intel core i3 2130 3.4GHz
  • Graphics: GTX 280
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
